blocks.name: ccph
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of subcomplex pre-Hilbert spaces.
blocks.origin: const class ccph { CPreHil }

blocks.name: diff.ccph.s
diff.ccph.c
diff.ccph.w
ctcph
blocks.content: Function to put a norm on a pre-Hilbert space.
blocks.origin: const class ctcph { toCPreHil }

blocks.name: diff.ctcph.s
diff.ctcph.c
diff.ctcph.w
df-cph
blocks.content: Define the class of subcomplex pre-Hilbert spaces. By restricting the scalar field to a subfield of ` CCfld ` closed under square roots of nonnegative reals, we have enough structure to define a norm, with the associated connection to a metric and topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cph(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccph, crab(s0, cin(cphl, cnlm), wsbc(s1, cfv(csca, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), w3a(wceq(cv(s1), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(s2))), wss(cima(csqrt, cin(cv(s2), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(cnm, cv(s0)), cmpt(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s3), cfv(cip, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-tcph
blocks.content: Define a function to augment a pre-Hilbert space with a norm. No extra parameters are needed, but some conditions must be satisfied to ensure that this in fact creates a normed subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: iscph
blocks.content: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is exactly a pre-Hilbert space over a subfield of the field of complex numbers closed under square roots of nonnegative reals equipped with a norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  anbi1i(wa(wcel(c0, cin(cphl, cnlm)), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))), wa(wss(cima(csqrt, cin(c2, co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), c2), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s0)))))), w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, cnlm), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))

  elin(c0, cphl, cnlm)

  mpbid(w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cui, ccnfld)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, ccnfld), c0), c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c1))))
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c1)), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2))), w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)))

  syl(w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, co(ccnfld, cress, c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrg0(c1, ccnfld, nat0, co(ccnfld, cress, c1))
  cnfld0()
  fveq2d(c0g, c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c1), w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)))
  eldifsn(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqtr3d(cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2))), cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c1)), cfv(cui, c2), w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)))
  syl(w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(cfv(cui, c2), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2)))), wcel(c2, cdr))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c2, cdr))
  simprbi(wcel(c2, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c2), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2)))), wcel(c2, crg))
  isdrng(c2, cfv(cui, c2), c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c2))

  fveq2d(cui, c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c1), w3a(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0), wceq(c2, co(ccnfld, cress, c1)))

  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))

  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0)‚Üí(1[√∑]c0)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c2)

  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0), ((invr ` CCfld)` c0)=(1[√∑]c0), c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c0 ‚â† 0)

  mpbid((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0), (c0 ‚àà(Unit ` CCfld)‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß((invr ` CCfld)` c0)‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà(Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, (Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c1)), (c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0))
  sylanbrc((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0), c0 ‚àà(c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚â†(0 ` c2))
  simp2(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚â† 0)
  neeqtrd(c0, (0 ` c2), nat0, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0))
  simp3(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚â† 0)

  syl((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0), 0 =(0 `(CCfld[|`s]c1)), c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))

  eldifsn(c0, c1, (0 ` c2))
  eqtr3d((c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), (Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c1)), (Unit ` c2), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0))
  syl((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0), (Unit ` c2)=(c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), c2 ‚àà DivRing)
  3ad2ant1(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚â† 0, c2 ‚àà DivRing)
  simprbi(c2 ‚àà DivRing, (Unit ` c2)=(c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), c2 ‚àà Ring)

  eqid((0 ` c2))

blocks.name: cphsca
blocks.content: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a vector space over a subfield of ` CCfld ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cphsubrg
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a subring of ` CCfld ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cphreccl
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is closed under reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cphdivcl
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is closed under reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphdivcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  divrecd(c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  sseldd(c1, cc, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  sseldd(c3, cc, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wss(c2, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrgss(c2, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c3)), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c3), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  cphsubrg(c0, c2, c4)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c3), c2))
  cphreccl(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  subrgmcl(c2, ccnfld, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c3), cmul)
  cnfldmul()
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚â† 0))‚Üí(c1[√∑]c3)‚àà c2)

blocks.name: cphcjcl
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is closed under conjugation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphcjcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(ccj, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cfv(ccj, c1), c2, cfv(cfv(cstv, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cstv, c3), c1, ccj, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cstv, c3), ccj))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cstv, c3), ccj, cfv(cstv, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c0, ccph))
  fveq2d(cstv, c3, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphsca(c0, c3, c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(ccj, cfv(cstv, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c3)
  ressstarv(c2, universe, ccj, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), ccnfld)

blocks.name: cphsqrtcl3
blocks.content: If the scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space contains the imaginary unit ` _i ` , then it is closed under square roots (i.e., it is quadratically closed). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphsqrtcl3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  pm2.61d(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, c2), c1), wcel(cneg(c2), crp))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp), wcel(cfv(csqrt, c2), c1))
  eqeltrd(cfv(csqrt, c2), c1, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(csqrt, c2), co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c2))), cfv(csqrt, cneg(cneg(c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  fveq2d(csqrt, cneg(cneg(c2)), c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  negnegd(c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  sqrtnegd(cneg(c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c2))), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c2)), c1))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cneg(c2), crp))
  syl13anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c2)), c1), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(cneg(c2), c1), wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cneg(c2), c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c2), cneg(c2)), wcel(c2, cc))
  sseldd(c2, cc, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wss(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrgss(c1, ccnfld, cc)

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c2), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, c1))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c0, ccph))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cneg(c2), crp))

  subrgsubg(c1, ccnfld)

  3expia(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(cneg(c2), crp)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, c2), c1))

}

} = {

  sqrtnegd(-u(c2), ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+))

  syl13anc(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), (sqrt ` -u(c2))‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà CPreHil, -u(c2)‚àà c1, -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù, 0[‚â§]-u(c2))
  eqeltrrd(-u(c2), c1, ((invg ` CCfld)` c2), ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+))
  syl(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), ((invg ` CCfld)` c2)= -u(c2), c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sseldd(c2, cc, c1, ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+))
  syl(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), c1 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  subrgss(c1, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldneg(c2)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), ((invg ` CCfld)` c2)‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ‚àà c1)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld), c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  syl(((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß i ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚àß -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù+), c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), c0 ‚àà CPreHil)

  3adant3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cfv(cnm, c7), c1)))

thm cphipcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), cc))

blocks.name: cphnmfval
blocks.content: The value of the norm in a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is the square root of the inner product of a vector with itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphnmfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))), w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, cnlm), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))), wss(cima(csqrt, cin(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  iscph(s0, c0, cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c1, c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cphnmfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(sqrt `(s0[c3]s0))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚Üí c1 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(sqrt `(s0[c3]s0)))), d(s0, c3))

  iscph(s0, c0, (Scalar ` c0), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1, c2, c3)

blocks.name: cphnm
blocks.content: The square of the norm is the norm of an inner product in a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(csqrt, co(c1, c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(csqrt, co(c1, c4, c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0)))), c1), wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2))
  fveq1d(c3, c1, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphnmfval(hs0, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0)))), cfv(csqrt, co(c1, c4, c1)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0)), co(c1, c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  anidms(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0)), co(c1, c4, c1)))

thm cphipipcj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, c4, c3), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c1, c4, c3))))), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), cc))
  absval(co(c1, c4, c3))

  mulcld(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(ccj, co(c1, c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

thm cphorthcom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  eqeq2d(co(c3, c4, c1), nat0, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, cclm))

blocks.name: cphass
blocks.content: Associative law for inner product. Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. See ~ ipass , ~ his5 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c5), co(c1, cmul, co(c3, c7, c5))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c5), co(c1, cmul, co(c3, c7, c5)), co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c8), co(c3, c7, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c5), co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c8), co(c3, c7, c5))), wcel(c0, cphl))
  cphphl(c0)
  ipass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, cfv(cmulr, c8), c8)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c8))
  oveqd(c1, cmul, co(c3, c7, c5), cfv(cmulr, c8), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c8)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c8)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  cphclm(c0)
  clmmul(c0, c8)
}

thm cphass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4))‚Üí((c1[c6]c3)[c7]c5)=(c1[√ó](c3[c7]c5)))
  ‚ä£ c7 =(¬∑ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c8)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d(((c1[c6]c3)[c7]c5), (c1[√ó](c3[c7]c5)), (c1[(√ó ` c8)](c3[c7]c5)), (c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4), ((c1[c6]c3)[c7]c5)=(c1[(√ó ` c8)](c3[c7]c5)), c0 ‚àà PreHil)
  cphphl(c0)
  ipass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, (√ó ` c8), c8)
  eqid((√ó ` c8))
  oveqd(c1, cmul, (c3[c7]c5), (√ó ` c8), (c0 ‚àà CPreHil ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4), √ó =(√ó ` c8))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, √ó =(√ó ` c8), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  cphclm(c0)
  clmmul(c0, c8)
}

blocks.name: cphassr
blocks.content: "Associative" law for second argument of inner product (compare ~ cphass ). See ~ ipassr , his52 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cphassr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

} = {
  3eqtr4rd(co(c3, c6, co(c1, c7, c5)), co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(co(c3, c6, c5), cmul, cfv(ccj, c1)), co(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cmulr, c8), cfv(cfv(cstv, c8), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c8)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmmul(c0, c8)
  eqidd(co(c3, c6, c5), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  fveq1d(ccj, c1, cfv(cstv, c8), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wceq(ccj, cfv(cstv, c8)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmcj(c0, c8)
  mulcomd(cfv(ccj, c1), co(c3, c6, c5), wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  cjcld(c1, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  sseldd(c1, cc, c2, wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))), wss(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cclm))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  cphclm(c0)
  clmsscn(c0, c2, c8)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(co(c3, c6, c5), cc))
  cphipcl(c0, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, ccph), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(co(c3, c6, co(c1, c7, c5)), co(co(c3, c6, c5), cfv(cmulr, c8), cfv(cfv(cstv, c8), c1))), wcel(c0, cphl), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c1, c2)))
  cphphl(c0)
  biimpi(w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anrot(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))
  ipassr(c0, c3, c4, c5, c1, c2, c6, c7, cfv(cmulr, c8), cfv(cstv, c8), c8)

  eqid(cfv(cstv, c8))

  3adant3r1(c0 ‚àà CPreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4, (c3[c6]c5)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)

  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccph), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c5)), wcel(c0, cclm))

}

thm tcphex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mp3an(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), universe), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), c0, cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), universe))
  fmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), c0, cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))))
  fvrn0(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c2)
  unex(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))
  ssexi(crn(csqrt), cc)
  cnex()
  ax-mp(wss(crn(csqrt), cc), wf(csqrt, cc, cc))
  sqrtf()
  frn(csqrt, cc, cc)
  p0ex()
  fex2(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), c0, cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls)), universe, universe)
  diff.cun.s(s0, crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))
  diff.crn.s(s0, csqrt)
  diff.csqrt.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tcphval
blocks.content: Define a function to augment a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space with norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tcphval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctcph, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cip, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  eqtri(c0, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))), cfv(ctcph, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(ctcph, c1), co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, ctcph, co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))), co(cv(hs0), ctng, cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), ctng, cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cbs)
  fveq2d(csqrt, co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cip, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cip)
  df-tcph(hs0, s0)
  ovex(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(ctcph, c1), co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, ctcph)
  ovprc1(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))))
  reldmtng()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, ctng, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: tcphphl
blocks.content: Augmentation of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space with a norm does not affect whether it is still a pre-Hilbert space (because all the original components are the same). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tcphphl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, cphl))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctcph, c0))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, cphl)))
  phlpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  tcphbas(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  tchplusg(cfv(cplusg, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqidd(cfv(csca, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, c1)))
  tcphsca(cfv(csca, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(cvsca, c1), wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(cvsca, c1)))
  tcphvsca(cfv(cvsca, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c0))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cip, c0), cfv(cip, c1), wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))

thm tchnmfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mpan2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))), cfv(cnm, c4)), wf(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s0)))), c2, cun(crn(csqrt), csn(emptycls))))

thm tcphcphlem3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

thm tcphcphlem3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[c2]c0)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(toCPreHil ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Scalar ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà PreHil)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 =(CCfld[|`s]c6))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(¬∑ ` c4)
} = {
  cjrebd((c0[c2]c0), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  sseldd((c0[c2]c0), cc, (Base ` c5), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))

  3anidm23(c4 ‚àà PreHil, c0 ‚àà c1, (c0[c2]c0)‚àà(Base ` c5))
  ipcl(c4, c0, c1, c0, c2, (Base ` c5), c5)
  eqid((Base ` c5))
  eqtrd((* `(c0[c2]c0)), (c0[c2]c0), ((*r ` c5)`(c0[c2]c0)), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  fveq1d(ccj, (c0[c2]c0), (*r ` c5), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  syl((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), * =(*r ` c5), c4 ‚àà CMod)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà CMod)
  phclm(c4, c3, c1, c5, c6, w0)
  clmcj(c4, c5)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), ((*r ` c5)`(c0[c2]c0))=(c0[c2]c0), c4 ‚àà PreHil, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà PreHil)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ipcj(c4, c0, c1, c0, (*r ` c5), c2, c5)
  eqid((*r ` c5))
}

blocks.name: tcphcph
blocks.content: The standard definition of a norm turns any pre-Hilbert space over a subfield of ` CCfld ` closed under square roots of nonnegative reals into a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space (which allows access to a norm, metric, and topology). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ipcau
blocks.content: The Cauchy-Schwarz inequality for a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)

thm ipcau(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c1, c4, c3)), cle, co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, cfv(c5, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnm, c0))
} = {
  breqtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(c1, c4, c3)), cle, co(cfv(c5, c1), cmul, cfv(c5, c3)), co(cfv(cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)), c1), cmul, cfv(cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)), c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  ipcau2(hs0, c1, c4, c3, cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)), cfv(ctcph, c0), c0, c2, cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cdiv, co(c3, c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphphl(c0)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(csca, c0), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphsca(c0, cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, ccph))
  cphsqrtcl(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, ccph))
  ipge0(c0, cv(hs0), c2, c4)

  eqid(cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)))
  eqid(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cdiv, co(c3, c4, c3)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

  fveq1d(c5, c1, cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  fveq1d(c5, c3, cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c5, cfv(cnm, cfv(ctcph, c0))), wcel(c0, ccph))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

blocks.name: nmpar
blocks.content: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space satisfies the parallelogram law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmpar(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
} = {
  nmparlem(c4, c1, c5, c3, c6, c2, c0, cfv(cip, c0), cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cip, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
}

blocks.name: ipcnlem1
blocks.content: The inner product operation of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cnmpt1ip
blocks.content: Continuity of inner product; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` .i ` is not a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmpt1ip(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c4, ccn, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ctopn, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cip, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, ccph))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, ccn, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, ccn, c6)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c4, ccn, c5), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cfv(cipf, c7), c3)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cfv(cipf, c7), c3), co(c1, c2, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cipf, c7), c3), co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c7)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c7), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c7))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, ccn, c6)))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c6, cfv(cbs, c7), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c7), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c7))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, ccn, c6)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c7))), wcel(c7, ctps))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c7, ctps), wcel(c7, ccph), wcel(c7, cngp))
  cphngp(c7)
  ngptps(c7)
  istps(c7, c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  cnf2(c4, c0, c6, cfv(cbs, c7), cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  ipfval(c1, cfv(cbs, c7), c3, cfv(cipf, c7), c2, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
  cnmpt12f(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cipf, c7), c3, c4, c5, c6, c6, w0)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[c2]c3))‚àà(c4[Cn]c5))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(TopOpen ` c7)

  ‚ä£ c2 =(¬∑ ` c7)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c3)‚àà(c4[Cn]c6))

blocks.name: csscld
blocks.content: A "closed subspace" in a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is actually closed in the topology induced by the norm, thus justifying the terminology "closed subspace". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clsocv
blocks.content: The orthogonal complement of the closure of a subset is the same as the orthogonal complement of the subset itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
